short_summary: Sheet metal services for Public Health Agency Canada (PHAC) facilities in Winnipeg, Manitoba, for 5-year period.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME:... (condensed from the tender description)
full_summary:
## Tender Announcement for Sheet Metal Services
### Reference: WS4322804300-Doc4328435330 - Amendment 1

**Publication Date:** November 28, 2023
**Closing Date:** January 5, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals for the provision of sheet metal services to the Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) facilities in Winnipeg, Manitoba.

**Requirements:**

- Provision of skilled licensed labour, tools, equipment, supervision, and materials necessary for various types of sheet metal services.
- Services are to be provided on an "as required" basis.
- The Standing Offer shall be for a five-year period.

**Contract Details:**

- **Contracting Entity:** Departments of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Facilities Address:** Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) facilities, Winnipeg, Manitoba
- **Location:** Manitoba

**Contact Information:**

- **Name:** Ullah, Sabieh (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Title:** [None]
- **Email:** [sabieh.ullah@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sabieh.ullah@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- **Phone:** [None]
- **Fax:** [None]

**Bid Submissions:**

- Bids must be submitted electronically and be received by January 5, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST.
- Late bids shall be declared non-responsive.

**Compliance:**

- This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
- Bidders must be qualified and able to perform the work in accordance with the contract requirements.

**Notice:**

- All required supporting documents must be submitted with the bid.
- The contract shall be awarded on the basis of lowest priced bid.

**Language of Tender:**

- The official language of the tender is English. French shall be accepted equally.

You can find the complete tender documents on Ariba Discovery at the following URL: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18132092?extsite=MTgxMzIwOTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>
